metadata.synopsis: You've dug up this poor child's mother's grave right infront of his eyes to loot it. He's quite rightly horrified. You monster.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to Kurwin Coffin- Find the child in the upper graveyard, near the house- Dig up the grave by the child- Feel all the guilt in the worldBookmark: larian://bookmark?name=CTY_KurwinCoffin&mod=GustavDev&level=CTY_Main_A&camPos=3.885604;42.978622;30.843765&camTarget=4.312797;42.531807;30.057722
